<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Let me understand what the user wants:
1. Show line height variables with clamp sizes in copyable fields
2. Make colors copyable as well
3. If line heights are rem values, specify the unit labels

Looking at the CSS file, I see line heights are defined as:
- `--line-height-none: 1;` (unitless)
- `--line-height-tight: 1.25;` (unitless)
- `--line-height-snug: 1.375;` (unitless)
- `--line-height-normal: 1.5;` (unitless)
- `--line-height-relaxed: 1.625;` (unitless)
- `--line-height-loose: 2;` (unitless)

These are unitless values (ratio-based), so I need to display them appropriately.

Looking at the screenshot provided by the user, I can see:
- Typography section showing font sizes like 5XL, 6XL with their CSS variables
- Line Heights section showing: None (1), Tight (1.25), Snug (1.375), Normal (1.5), Relaxed (1.625), Loose (2)

The user wants:
1. Line heights to have clickable/copyable fields showing the variable AND the value
2. Colors to be clickable/copyable
3. If rem values, show the unit label (but line heights here are unitless ratios)

I need to look at where these typography and line height displays are. Let me check the typography page or if this display is on the preview page. Looking at the screenshot, it seems like it's part of a typography tokens display page, not the preview page.

Let me search for where this line height display is:</details></think>

```diff
@@ -44,4 +47,75 @@
    { name: 'Black', variable: '--font-weight-black', value: '900' },
  ];
+ 
+ // Reusable copy field component
+ function CopyField({ 
+   value, 
+   displayValue, 
+   variant = 'default' 
+ }: { 
+   value: string; 
+   displayValue?: string; 
+   variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted';
+ }) {
+   const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const copyToClipboard = async () =&gt; {
+     await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);
+     setCopied(true);
+     setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);
+   };
+ 
+   const colors = {
+     default: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-foreground)',
+     },
+     primary: {
+       bg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.1)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)',
+       text: 'var(--color-brand)',
+     },
+     muted: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-muted)',
+     },
+   };
+ 
+   const style = colors[variant];
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;button
+       onClick={copyToClipboard}
+       className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 font-mono transition-all group"
+       style={{
+         fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',
+         color: style.text,
+         backgroundColor: copied ? 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.15)' : style.bg,
+         padding: '4px 8px',
+         borderRadius: '6px',
+         border: 'none',
+         cursor: 'pointer',
+       }}
+       onMouseEnter={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bgHover;
+       }}
+       onMouseLeave={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bg;
+       }}
+       title={&#96;Click to copy: ${value}&#96;}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;span style={{ color: copied ? '#10B981' : style.text }}&gt;
+         {displayValue || value}
+       &lt;/span&gt;
+       {copied ? (
+         &lt;Check className="w-3 h-3" style={{ color: '#10B981' }} /&gt;
+       ) : (
+         &lt;Copy className="w-3 h-3 opacity-40 group-hover:opacity-70 transition-opacity" /&gt;
+       )}
+     &lt;/button&gt;
+   );
+ }
  
  export default function TypographyPage() {
```

### Typography Page (`/tokens/typography`)

**Line Heights:**
- Added a description noting these are "Unitless ratio values"
- Each card now has two copyable fields:
  - CSS variable (e.g., `--line-height-tight`) - teal colored
  - Ratio value with "(ratio)" label (e.g., `1.25 (ratio)`) - gray colored

**Font Weights:**
- Same treatment with copyable variable and numeric value fields

### Colors Page (`/tokens/colors`)

- Hex value is now displayed prominently in the color swatch area
- Two copyable fields per color:
  - CSS variable (e.g., `--color-brand`) - teal colored
  - Hex value (e.g., `#2AAFB8`) - gray colored
- Click any field and it copies to clipboard with a ✓ checkmark feedback

All copy fields show a subtle copy icon that becomes more visible on hover, and turn green with a checkmark when clicked to confirm the copy action.

```diff
@@ -7,4 +10,75 @@
    pxValue: string;
  }
+ 
+ // Reusable copy field component
+ function CopyField({ 
+   value, 
+   displayValue, 
+   variant = 'default' 
+ }: { 
+   value: string; 
+   displayValue?: string; 
+   variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted';
+ }) {
+   const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const copyToClipboard = async () =&gt; {
+     await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);
+     setCopied(true);
+     setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);
+   };
+ 
+   const colors = {
+     default: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-foreground)',
+     },
+     primary: {
+       bg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.1)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)',
+       text: 'var(--color-brand)',
+     },
+     muted: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-muted)',
+     },
+   };
+ 
+   const style = colors[variant];
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;button
+       onClick={copyToClipboard}
+       className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 font-mono transition-all group"
+       style={{
+         fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',
+         color: style.text,
+         backgroundColor: copied ? 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.15)' : style.bg,
+         padding: '4px 8px',
+         borderRadius: '6px',
+         border: 'none',
+         cursor: 'pointer',
+       }}
+       onMouseEnter={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bgHover;
+       }}
+       onMouseLeave={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bg;
+       }}
+       title={&#96;Click to copy: ${value}&#96;}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;span style={{ color: copied ? '#10B981' : style.text }}&gt;
+         {displayValue || value}
+       &lt;/span&gt;
+       {copied ? (
+         &lt;Check className="w-3 h-3" style={{ color: '#10B981' }} /&gt;
+       ) : (
+         &lt;Copy className="w-3 h-3 opacity-40 group-hover:opacity-70 transition-opacity" /&gt;
+       )}
+     &lt;/button&gt;
+   );
+ }
  
  const spacingTokens: SpacingToken[] = [
```

```diff
+   variant?: 'default' | 'primary' | 'muted';
+ }) {
+   const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const copyToClipboard = async () =&gt; {
+     await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);
+     setCopied(true);
+     setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);
+   };
+ 
+   const colors = {
+     default: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-foreground)',
+     },
+     primary: {
+       bg: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.1)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)',
+       text: 'var(--color-brand)',
+     },
+     muted: {
+       bg: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.08)',
+       bgHover: 'rgba(100, 116, 139, 0.15)',
+       text: 'var(--color-muted)',
+     },
+   };
+ 
+   const style = colors[variant];
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;button
+       onClick={copyToClipboard}
+       className="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 font-mono transition-all group"
+       style={{
+         fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',
+         color: style.text,
+         backgroundColor: copied ? 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.15)' : style.bg,
+         padding: '4px 8px',
+         borderRadius: '6px',
+         border: 'none',
+         cursor: 'pointer',
+       }}
+       onMouseEnter={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bgHover;
+       }}
+       onMouseLeave={(e) =&gt; {
+         if (!copied) e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = style.bg;
+       }}
+       title={&#96;Click to copy: ${value}&#96;}
+     &gt;
+       &lt;span style={{ color: copied ? '#10B981' : style.text }}&gt;
+         {displayValue || value}
+       &lt;/span&gt;
+       {copied ? (
+         &lt;Check className="w-3 h-3" style={{ color: '#10B981' }} /&gt;
+       ) : (
+         &lt;Copy className="w-3 h-3 opacity-40 group-hover:opacity-70 transition-opacity" /&gt;
+       )}
+     &lt;/button&gt;
+   );
+ }
  
  export default function InputsPage() {
```

</details>

</tool-use>
